original_title: Pastor Thorne: Lust of the Flesh
overview: Pastor Jacob Thorne has a prominent church and a stellar reputation in his city; however, as his fame continues to grow, it is also blinding him causing him to lose focus on what really matters: his family. However, once his son blows into town, his life begins to go on an unexpected whirlwind that could cause his life to take an unwanted spiral downhill.
title: Pastor Thorne: Lust of the Flesh
